languages.text: "Что касается их варварской веры, то она связана с обожествлением земли и самого Януса. Труд в агрокомплексах воспринимается ими как священнодействие, что положительно сказывается на производительности".
"As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying both the soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which has had a positive impact on productivity."
languages.original_text: "Что касается их варварской веры, то она связана с обожествлением земли и самого Януса. Труд в агрокомплексах воспринимается ими как священнодействие, что положительно сказывается на производительности".

traits.locale_text: "As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which had a positive impact on productivity."
"As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which had a positive impact on productivity."
"As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying both the soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which has had a positive impact on productivity."
"As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying both the soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which has had a positive impact on productivity."
"As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying both the soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which has had a positive impact on productivity."
"As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying both the soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which has had a positive impact on productivity."

languages.text: «En cuanto a su religión bárbara, deifican tanto la tierra como el propio Janus. Para ellos, trabajar en un complejo agrícola es una forma de oración, lo que tiene un efecto positivo sobre su productividad».
languages.original_text: "As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying both the soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which has had a positive impact on productivity."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a su religión bárbara, deifican tanto la tierra como el propio Janus. Para ellos, trabajar en un complejo agrícola es una forma de oración, lo que tiene un efecto positivo sobre su productividad».

languages.text: « Quant à leur religion barbare, elle érige la terre et Janus au rang de divinités. Pour eux, le fait de travailler dans des agri-complexes est une forme de vénération, ce qui a des effets bénéfiques sur la productivité. »
languages.original_text: "As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying both the soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which has had a positive impact on productivity."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à leur religion barbare, elle érige la terre et Janus au rang de divinités. Pour eux, le fait de travailler dans des agri-complexes est une forme de vénération, ce qui a des effets bénéfiques sur la productivité. »

languages.text: “至于他们信奉的原始宗教，是对土地和加努斯予以神化的崇拜。对他们来说，在综合农业中心干活就是在侍奉神明。因此，他们的产能也得到了提高。”
languages.original_text: "As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying both the soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which has had a positive impact on productivity."

traits.locale_text: “至于他们信奉的原始宗教，是对土地和加努斯予以神化的崇拜。对他们来说，在综合农业中心干活就是在侍奉神明。因此，他们的产能也得到了提高。”

languages.text: 「彼らの野蛮な宗教は、土とヤヌスそのものを神格化しています。彼らにとっては、農業施設での労働は一種の崇拝であり、生産性に良い影響を与えているようです」
languages.original_text: "As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying both the soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which has had a positive impact on productivity."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの野蛮な宗教は、土とヤヌスそのものを神格化しています。彼らにとっては、農業施設での労働は一種の崇拝であり、生産性に良い影響を与えているようです」

languages.text: "Was ihre barbarische Religion angeht, widersetzen sie sich sowohl der Erde als auch Janus selbst. Für sie ist die Arbeit in einem Agri-Komplex eine Form der religiösen Verehrung, was sich positiv auf die Produktivität auswirkt."
languages.original_text: "As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying both the soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which has had a positive impact on productivity."

traits.locale_text: "Was ihre barbarische Religion angeht, widersetzen sie sich sowohl der Erde als auch Janus selbst. Für sie ist die Arbeit in einem Agri-Komplex eine Form der religiösen Verehrung, was sich positiv auf die Produktivität auswirkt."

languages.text: "Barbarca dinlerinden bahsetmemiz gerekirse hem toprağı hem de Janus'u ilahlaştırıyorlar. Onların gözünde bir tarım kompleksinde çalışmak, bir ibadet şekli ve bu da üretime olumlu bir etki sağlıyor."
languages.original_text: "As for their barbaric religion, they are deifying both the soil and Janus itself. To them, working in agri-complexes is a form of worship, which has had a positive impact on productivity."
